scripts.build:local: echo 'ğŸ”¨ Building Docker image posey-couchbase:latest...' && docker build --no-cache -t posey-couchbase:latest . && docker images posey-couchbase:latest
scripts.k8s:check: kubectl cluster-info > /dev/null 2>&1 || (echo 'Error: Kubernetes cluster not accessible. Please ensure:'; echo '1. Kubernetes is running (minikube, kind, etc.)'; echo '2. kubectl is configured correctly'; echo '3. Your VPN is connected if using a remote cluster'; exit 1)
scripts.deploy: yarn k8s:check && kubectl apply -f k8s/namespace.yaml && kubectl apply -k k8s
scripts.deploy:local: yarn build:local && yarn k8s:check && kubectl apply -f k8s/namespace.yaml && kubectl apply -k k8s
scripts.verify: yarn k8s:check && echo 'ğŸ” Checking pods:' && kubectl get pods -n posey -l app=posey-couchbase && echo 'ğŸ” Checking services:' && kubectl get services -n posey -o wide | grep couchbase
scripts.debug: echo 'ğŸ” Checking Docker images:' && docker images | grep couchbase && echo 'ğŸ” Checking Kubernetes pods:' && kubectl get pods -n posey -l app=posey-couchbase -o wide && echo 'ğŸ” Checking pod details:' && kubectl describe pod -n posey -l app=posey-couchbase || echo 'No pods found' && echo 'ğŸ” Checking PVC status:' && kubectl get pvc -n posey | grep couchbase && echo 'ğŸ” Checking Kubernetes events:' && kubectl get events -n posey --sort-by=.metadata.creationTimestamp | tail -n 15
scripts.connect: echo 'Couchbase UI is available at: http://localhost:8091 (when port-forwarded)' && echo 'To port-forward: kubectl port-forward service/posey-couchbase 8091:8091 -n posey'
